text:
Sapessi quanto è duro tirare fino a sera,
calcarla,
sospingersi in avanti,
pensar che restano ancora
rimasugli di giorno per non pensarti,
banchine bassoventre.

Sapessi com’è duro il coraggio a volte,
alzarsi,
affrontare il mattino
con tanta notte dentro,
sedersi alla finestra
a intrecciare distanze,
a vagheggiar telefoni,
consegne e rituali.

Sognarti,
nella simmetrica consuetudine
dell’abbraccio,
amarti senza affanni,
odiarti senza imbrogli,
temere che nulla resti,
sapere che nulla avremo,
guardarci senza quasi,
lasciarci senza ieri.

Sapessi come duole
stare senza te
a volte.

Milton Fernández

text: The sun rises, the time goes by, now just relax and close your eye. Look at the wonderful great blue heaven count the time until eleven. Then you´ll feel your tiredness and forget every kind of stress. And all your fears now go away, do you see the nice bright ray? Hope and peace it sends to you, the sky aren´t grey, they turn to blue. And when you wake up, the world has changed and all your pains are rearranged. So live your life, enjoy it well don´t think about going to hell. Relish every moment and every hour, and it will grow and stay like a flower. We just live it one time and never twice, listen to yourself and look at the sunrise. Hatuk Hill
author: Escherich Anja

text: I don´t wanna give everything up to fight for a better future. Because I´m afraid to losing everthing and then, everything stop. I need to breathe, but there is no eair to live. I don´t wanna give all that I have to be happy again. Because I´m so afraid to losing everything. To lose the last things that are important for me. Life for me is a real hell, sometimes I wish I was a whole other person. A person who can really smile and laugh, but than I´m realizing I would never be that person. Does have this life any sense to me? I don´t know it any more, my power is gone and I´m losing my fight. Everything goes wrong and nothing goes right. Everybody says, give everything to win your fight, but I can´t, I can´t fight anymore, I´m sorry. Hatuk Hill
author: Escherich Anja

text: The time is so sometimes hard and long but I always try to be hard and strong, you are not here, you are so far away and really everyday and every night I pray, I pray to be near you, near you all the time and pray that maybe one day you will be mine. This are my dreams, for now and the future and forever. For all my life I would like stay with you together, you bring the sunshine and the happyiness in my life, when you are not with me, is like a cut from a knife. I know that all are only words for you, but really believe me that all is the true. I want you, nothing more than you as I told you many times and all is the true, without you really my life is just blue. With you I fall in love with the first touch. Hatuk Hill
author: Escherich Anja

text: I have heard this song hundreds of times on the radio. Working at Wawa it was on the playlist and I heard it probably about every hour every shift. And I worked a lot. And I guess never really heard it. I saw an interview where he talked about why he wrote this and saw it in a new light. Had to come listen to it with a new perspective and don't know how I never saw it. As a recovering drug addict 4 years sober, I clearly never really "heard" this song. Just memorized the lyrics and listened to it. Enjoyed it. But didn't hear it. I am hearing it so much better now.

text:
Zapraszam do odkrycia muzyki mojego utalentowanego kolegi, który tworzy rap. Jego utwory są pełne energii, emocji i oryginalnego stylu. Teksty, których używa, mają głęboki sens i są napisane z pasją. Każdy utwór, który tworzy, ma swój unikalny styl i brzmienie, które pozwala mu wyróżnić się na tle innych artystów rapowych.   https://youtu.be/gJcOreaANyg

Jeśli jesteś fanem rapu, na pewno nie będziesz zawiedziony, słuchając muzyki mojego kolegi. Jego utwory to połączenie dobrze skonstruowanych bitów z głębokimi tekstami, które niosą ze sobą pozytywną energię i mocne przesłanie.

Dlatego też, jeśli szukasz czegoś nowego i oryginalnego, to koniecznie przesłuchaj muzykę mojego kolegi. Gwarantuję Ci, że z pewnością Cię zainteresuje i przypadnie Ci do gustu.

text:
Eğer Türksen bunu oku lütfen‼️ Arkadaşlar ben de bir mendesarmy olarak bu açıklamayı yapmaya karar verdim…

Öncelikle her zamanki gibi Shawn’dan beklenilen çoook güzel bir şarkı. Fakat ülkemizdeki mendesarmylerin sayısı gerçekten çok az😔. Böyle bir insan ülkemizde nasıl fark edilmedi hala çok merak ediyorum. Shawn bence daha çok şeyi hak ediyor. Lütfen yapmadıysanız arkadaş ve yakınlarınıza Shawn’dan bahsedin. Bu şarkı çıkalı yaklaşık 2 yıl oldu hala gelip dinliyor musunuz bilmiyorum ama lütfen tanıdıklarınıza Shawn’dan bahsedin. Shawn bu yıla gerçekten aşırı üzgün girdi. Lütfen en azından (bunu bilmese de ) ülkemizdeki mendesarmyleri artıralım.

Buraya kadar okuduysanız çok teşekkür ederim lütfen bu yorumu dikkate alın ☺️

text:
The reason I don't tell you stuff is because the only thing you ever do is to bring me down to my knees where I already fucking am!
I don't need you to kick me while I am there or spit on me! 
I need to be picked up! Hold or assured that everything is gonna be fucking okay even tho it probably never will! 
I need YOU! I need to be listened, understood or just fucking not alone!

I need ...
I just...
I am not me anymore...i lost myself such a long time ago and i am failing to find me again.
And it's destroying me..because the only thing I know that is gonna bring me back is denied from me..
And all these already broken pieces of my heart are falling into the void of eternal pain that I can't escape of. 
And i guess I just need someone who says, you can do it, or, i am fucking proud of you.
Because as much as I fucking hate it, i am not able to believe that myself.

text: If you find the video boring then you are just looking for something to entertain your eyes anyway, not your ears and mind. If you truly appreciate the song, the lyrics, the artist, and most importantly can personally relate to the struggle he's singing about, the video falls by the wayside. Grow up and comment on something that is worthy of commenting. I was teleported by the lyrics and the emotion, I didn't honestly pay attention to the video until the 2nd listen. I grew up with the introduction of MTV and came home from school to listen to my favorite music in video form but I don't rely on the video to provide me the audio comfort I was seeking when I searched it out. Hell half the time I'm interpreting something different than what is in the video.

text: I’m so greatful that shawn wrote this and that he’s so open about his mental health journey. I’m laying here fighting bad anxiety and having bad panic attacks that seem to keep coming and I can’t seem to control them. During a slightly calmer moment, I realized I was saying “help me” out loud then this song came into my head and now I feel calmer and my anxiety went away. I’m so happy because this song explains how I feel more than I can seem to and I feel like I’m less alone or “crazy” like I know I’m not crazy for being anxious but the way people react to me makes me feel like I am sometimes. Thank you Shawn for this gift. Thank you for all your songs. I feel like there’s a song for every emotion I feel and I can listen to you with whatever I’m feeling.

text: This song. When my mum died and I took on parental guardianship of my brother and my cousin, I was doing my degree and I had a essay due in. I laid on the toilet floor because it was all too much and I had an essay due in. I needed to finish it. I was being sick and you tube was playing and this song came on. While I was laid on that toilet floor. I got the essay done, got a first and ended up being a teacher. Why, because I wanted to be a teacher who Understood children's grief. My mum came to me that night

text: The sun rises, the time goes by, now just relax and close your eye. Look at the wonderful great blue heaven count the time until eleven. Then you´ll feel your tiredness and forget every kind of stress. And all your fears now go away, do you see the nice bright ray? Hope and peace it sends to you, the sky aren´t grey, they turn to blue. And when you wake up, the world has changed and all your pains are rearranged. So live your life, enjoy it well don´t think about going to hell. Relish every moment and every hour, and it will grow and stay like a flower. We just live it one time and never twice, listen to yourself and look at the sunrise. Hatuk Hill
author: Escherich Anja

text:
Jesus Christ Saves

Jesus Christ, the Son of God, is returning very soon, and is the reason for all of the things that are happening on the Earth right now. This planet is on borrowed time.

Jesus Christ died on a cross, was buried in a tomb, and rose from the dead 3 days later, to pay for the sins of mankind, to give us eternal life and forgiveness from God.

EXACTLY how to be Saved by Jesus Christ, the Son of God:

1. Confess with your mouth that Jesus Christ is Lord.

2. Believe in your heart that God has raised Jesus Christ from the dead.

Biblical References:
1. Romans 5:9
2. Romans 3:23
3. Romans 6:23
4. Romans 10:9
5. Romans 10:13
6. Ephesians 2: 8 & 9
7. John 3:16

God bless you, peace be with you always. Thank you for your time.

text:
eu escutava essa música, gostava, é uma puta música. Mas hoje, talvez infelizmente, eu entendo completamente cada palavra da música, tô até assustada.
É uma sensação terrível a de ser rodeado de pessoas incríveis mas que não te enxergam, que não te ajudam, é como pedir ajuda ao escuro. eu sinto que não consigo respirar, mas não tá no meu sangue desistir, e isso é muito difícil. mesmo com toda a dor e ao mesmo tempo a sensação de vazio eu preciso ser forte.
mas parece mesmo que as paredes estão desabando em cima de mim, e não tem como fugir.
muito obrigada Shawn por por em palavras os sentimentos que eu não conseguia explicar, essa música significa muito pra mim.
eu espero que eu consiga alguém pra me ajudar, antes que eu me afunde mais.
author: Luiza Santana
